messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re:  chat rooms
messages.msgSnippet: About a year ago I set up a chat for kids.  It was tricky because of time zones and some kids prefer to chat during the day while others prefer evenings or
messages.messageBody:
About a year ago I set up a chat for kids. It was tricky because of time zones and some kids prefer to chat during the day while others prefer evenings or even late night. I think the kids who participated had fun though.

The message boards at http://www.unschooling.com/discus/messages/board-topics.html have a kids folder. Scroll down to Unschoolers in Action.

yahoogroups has a chat feature too. I used it once with my local HS group.

Mary Ellen
----- Original Message ----- Hello all. My daughter is 10 and wants to find other kids to chat
with on-line.

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re:  chat rooms
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all.  My daughter is 10 and wants to find other kids to chat with on-line.  Anybody know of a chat room where unschoolers congregate?  I have never used
messages.messageBody:
Hello all. My daughter is 10 and wants to find other kids to chat
with on-line. Anybody know of a chat room where unschoolers
congregate? I have never used the chat room thing myself, so I
guess I might need to try it, too. Deirdre
